It also adds a new spell called "Soul Dispersal" to remove the effects at any time. Comes with an optional "More Draconic Dragon Aspect" compatible version!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][UPDATE + WARNING]: Apparently the problems people have been experiencing with "More Draconic Dragon Aspect" are due to him keeping separate plugins (.esp's) for each "color". I can only assume the problems are due to the records being different between the versions.

I will not be making a version of this mod for every color, so UNLESS YOU USE THE SAME COLORS I CHOSE, DO NOT USE THE "MORE DRACONIC ASPECT" VERSION OF THIS MOD!!! I did go over HOW I made this mod in the comments section *somewhere*, though, so feel free to make you own versions for the color you'd prefer...[/size]


[color=#ffff00][[/color][color=#ff7700]WARNING[/color][color=#ffff00]][/color]: [color=#ff0000]ALL VERSIONS REQUIRE THE DRAGONBORN DLC, AND THE[/color] "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54306/?]More Draconic Dragon Aspect[/url]" [color=#ff0000]VERSION REQUIRES BOTH THAT MOD, AND [/color]"[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53271/?]Animated Dragon Wings[/url]"[color=#ff0000]!

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/b7O5gd7.png[/img][/url]
[/color]

[youtube]nS_VimivFvE[/youtube]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/E6uD5Fh.png[/img]
Another mod I made for Skyrim. It makes the Dragon Aspect shout from the Dragonborn DLC (required) have an unlimited duration, and removed the annoying "once per day" flag. It also adds a new spell called "Soul Dispersal" to remove the effects at any time. There are two versions - the one shown in the video is compatible with "More Draconic Dragon Aspect" (the default "Wings and Tail" version. If you also use the "Powered Edition" plugin, you will probably need to place my mod before that plugin in your load order. I may make a specific patch for that version of enough people want it). The other version just requires the Dragonborn DLC and nothing else!

So if you want to use the version seen here, you'll also need:
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54306/?]More Draconic Dragon Aspect[/url] by Stania
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53271/?]Animated Dragon Wings[/url] by Anton

Also: the recoloring of the effect shown in the video and screenshots is one of the options for "More Draconic Dragon Aspect".


How it Works:

All I did was add a removal spell, and tag every magic effect from the shout with a new "Keyword". The spell I added simply removes all magic effects with that keyword when cast (it doesn't even require a script - there's a handly little check box above the Keywords box in the Magic Effects dialog box in the CK that says something like "Dispel effects with the following Keywords".

The only script that mod has is to add the spell to the player after the mod is installed. It will run ONCE, then be disabled, so although there IS a script with this mod, you shouldn't have any issue removing the mod at any time (but it's still not a good practice to be removing mods mid-game).

[img]http://i.imgur.com/ozcNx8X.png[/img]
Either use a mod manager (I HIGHLY recommend Mod Organizer (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334/?)), or manually drag DragonAspectToggle_DAT.esp and the Scripts folder into your Skyrim Data directory.


[img]http://i.imgur.com/ailxJ0q.png[/img]
Simply use a mod manager, or delete the following files: DragonAspectToggle_DAT.esp, DAT_PlayerAddSpell_Script.pex, and DAT_PlayerAddSpell_Script.psc


[img]http://i.imgur.com/uHMISma.png[/img]
Please do not edit, or use this mod in another mod without asking my permission. This mod is also not allowed to be uploaded to other sites - I will post it here and on the steam workshop, but that's it! If you just want to edit this mod for personal use, that's fine, but don't upload it without asking me first! :)
